name: Devine Foods
text:
Breakfast
Breakfast #1
Two eggs, home fries, and two toast.
$11.99
Breakfast #2
Two eggs, home fries, three sausages or bacon or ham, and two toast.
$15.49
Breakfast #3
Two eggs, home fries, three sausages or bacon or ham, two toast, and two cookies.
$17.99
Breakfast for Two
Four scrambled eggs, three bacons/three sausages/three ham (choose any two), home fries, and four toasts.
$27.99
Breakfast for Four
Eight scrambled eggs, six bacons/six sausages/ six ham (choose any two), home fries, eight toast, and one French toast.
$56.99
Omelets
Omelets are made with three eggs and comes with home fries and toast.
Western Omelet
Bacon, green pepper, and green onion.
$12.99
Denver Omelet
Ham, green pepper, and green onion.
$12.99
Ham and Cheese Omelet
$12.99
Spanish Omelet
Tomatoes, green pepper, green onion, cheese, and salsa sauce.
$14.49
Texas Omelet
Bacon, tomatoes, green pepper, green onion, and cheese.
$14.49
Meat Lover
Bacon, ham, sausage, and cheese.
$16.99
Salad
Garden Salad
Fresh Romaine lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, green peppers, cucumbers and carrots, served with choice of dressing.
$13.00
Caesar Salad
Fresh romaine lettuce, bacon bites, creamy caesar dressing, and croutons.
$13.00
Greek Salad
Red onion, cucumbers, feta cheese, and black olives.
$13.00
Chef Salad
Fresh Romaine lettuce, spinach, tomatoes, green peppers, cucumbers and carrots, ham, chicken, hard boiled eggs, cheese served with choice of dressing.
$19.99

$7.99
